Reviews.Title: 2nd phone
Reviews.Author: another one
Reviews.Content: I purchase a z9 phone 3years ago and loved it. Till one day I couldn't get the battery to charge anymore something had gone wrong with the charging port. I was not ready for the touch screen phones. My phone service found me one at amazon just like the one I had.Thank you, so maybe this new z9 will last me 3 more years YEA!!!

Reviews.Title: phone no more
Reviews.Author: old and Firm
Reviews.Content: This was a great phone. Too bad it is now obsolete. This put every smart phone to shame as a pure phone.

Reviews.Title: Had No Signal at All
Reviews.Author: Patrick Buxton
Reviews.Content: I returned this phone because it did not recieve a signal.  I was trying to replace the old Z9 that the button had worn out  on.  The old one was the opposite.  It recieve a signal where no other phone could.  I am not sure what was wrong with this one.

ProductInfo.Features:
Delivers clear calls and a feature-rich experience in style
Marking the path with turn-by-turn driving instructions, MOTO Z9 features automatic re-route and full-color moving maps
Find hotels, restaurants, gas stations and more and never have the need to stop and ask directions
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Z9 GSM Rizr 2  Unlocked Cell Phone with Camera, Large LCD Display--International Version with Warranty (Red)
